comments.author: michel.azevedo@gmail.com

comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8) Gecko/20051111 Firefox/1.5
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8) Gecko/20051111 Firefox/1.5

When you set frame.src, all estabilished socket connections are aborted. 

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a html page with a iframe dom object
2. Create a xmlHttpRequest object in the parent window
3. Send a request by xmlHttpRequest that response change the iframe.src
